title: E-commerce Conversion Lift
challenge: A growing e-commerce brand was experiencing a 2.1% checkout conversion rate—significantly below industry standards of 2.8%–3.2%. Cart abandonment was the primary leak, costing the business ~$50k/month in lost revenue.
approach: Conducted user research and heatmaps to identify friction points. Redesigned the 5-step checkout into a 3-step progressive form, optimized for mobile (68% of traffic). Added trust signals, multiple payment options, and real-time inventory feedback. Implemented A/B tests on CTA button colors, copy, and form field validation.
outcome: Increased conversion rate by 23% (2.1% → 2.58%) within 8 weeks. Reduced cart abandonment by 31%. Generated additional $120k revenue in first quarter post-launch.
testimonial: The team transformed our checkout experience. They didn't just redesign—they understood our customers. The increase in conversions was immediate and measurable.

title: SaaS Onboarding Redesign
challenge: A B2B SaaS platform had a 35% trial-to-paid conversion rate with a particularly problematic onboarding flow. New users were abandoning during setup, with 42% not completing initial data integration within the first week.
approach: Redesigned the onboarding flow from 12 steps to 5 key milestones. Built interactive tutorials with in-app guidance. Added a progress indicator and celebrated micro-wins. Implemented contextual help and integrated Intercom for live support.
outcome: Trial-to-paid conversion increased to 52%. Time-to-first-value reduced by 67%. Support tickets related to setup decreased by 58%.
testimonial: They completely reimagined our onboarding. Our users are now productive in minutes instead of days. This directly impacted our growth metrics.
role: Product Designer, UX Researcher & Full-Stack Developer

title: Brand Redesign & Website Rebuild
challenge: An established design studio needed to modernize their image. Their outdated website was inconsistent with their creative output and wasn't generating leads. Conversion rate was 0.3%.
approach: Developed a comprehensive rebrand including logo evolution, color system, and typography guidelines. Built a high-performance Next.js site with Framer Motion animations, case study galleries, and an automated blogging system using MDX. Implemented SEO best practices and conversion optimizations.
outcome: Website traffic increased by 156%. Lead generation increased to 15 qualified leads/month (up from 2). Time-on-site increased by 94%. Case study pages became the top-converting asset.
testimonial: This team elevated our brand presence online. The new website perfectly represents our work and consistently brings in high-quality leads.

title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
challenge: InsightData needed a real-time analytics dashboard for their enterprise clients. The previous dashboard was slow, confusing, and required manual data refresh. Users couldn't track real-time metrics.
approach: Architected a real-time dashboard using WebSockets for live data updates. Implemented efficient data visualization with Recharts. Built customizable widgets and a drag-and-drop interface. Added role-based access control and data export capabilities.
outcome: Page load time reduced from 8.2s to 1.3s. Real-time metric latency under 200ms. User engagement increased by 73%. Enterprise customers reported 40% improvement in decision-making speed.
testimonial: The dashboard transformed how we work with data. Real-time insights have directly improved our decision-making process and our clients are thrilled.
